messages.content: It's 2019 and people are *still* saying "SJW's?" Ha! Hahahahaha! Oh my life. [NAME].
My bio is pretty funny... I got ‘If you’re a Catfish then you’ll be charged a call out fee of £120.49’
I said this somewhere else.. but I swear that man in the hood is caucasian... But that was actually hilarious
Yeah, it's pretty funny how incapable most of them are of actual satire and subtlety.
ha ha LOL guys aren't we so QuIrKyyyy
Haha this is one of those moments that makes me laugh out loud
i did, but it was at 3 am before i went to bed, so i’m gonna cheat and count it as 2018 LOL.
This has to be a joke...
I rarely get full manic. Lithium just took away my mixed irritable angry episodes and I'm pretty sure those aren't superpowers lol
Hahahahhahhaha!!! Thats the right wing in a nutshell.....
lol why don't you read about the Iceland one and get back to me.
Why so much green though lol
His entire face is covered by a beard and sunglasses lol
Lol.... i guess your personal experience explains everything.... personally I've seen this play out numerous times in the work place..... so.....
Lol you could have just said that
I'm more saying that I think the south is a joke.
You sure? They seem so much brighter on screen lol
Lol I always go with public speaking ("but I'm trying to be better at it!!").
Y’all out here really believing this and I think that’s the funniest part
republicans and their hatred of Nordic countries are hilarious. "Oh no some place has a much higher standard of living than us let's bash it!"
its funny because they dont even do anything at the look out tower but stargaze
